title: Charlie Brooks
summary:
Charlene Emma Brooks (born 3 May 1981) is an English actress, known for her role of Janine Butcher in the BBC soap opera EastEnders. Brooks has also appeared in British television shows The Bill, Wired and Bleak House, as well as portraying Anna Fallmont in the Network 10 drama Lie With Me. 
Brooks has also won the reality shows Strictly Come Dancing Christmas Special in 2011 and the twelfth series of I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here!.
